summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Grand Street, from 12th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8367 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
